title: Automart
description: A MERN applicaion which is an online marketplace for automobiles, with Auto Mart users posting their cars for sale.

title: Chat App
description: A fullstack android chat application entirely from scratch. The backend service is created using Gin Framework (Golang) and the frontend with React Native

title: Blog App
description: A Backend service for a blogging application built with nestjs. Includes user authentication and authorization. MongoDB Database
